name: Healing Herb
description: A fragrant green herb with restorative properties. Can be consumed to restore a small amount of health.

name: Health Potion
description: A small glass vial filled with glowing red liquid. Restores a moderate amount of health when consumed.

name: Glowing Mushroom
description: A bioluminescent fungus that pulses with an eerie blue light. Consuming it restores a small amount of health but tastes terrible.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron blade, well-balanced and sharp. A reliable weapon for any adventurer.

name: Leather Armor
description: A set of hardened leather armor. Offers decent protection without sacrificing mobility.

name: Enchanted Blade
description: A sword that glows with a faint green light. Ancient runes are etched along the fuller. It feels alive in your hand.

name: Spider Silk Vest
description: Woven from the silk of giant forest spiders, this vest is surprisingly tough and lightweight.

name: Gold Ring
description: A simple gold ring, slightly tarnished. It might be worth something to the right buyer.

name: Pouch of Gold
description: A small leather pouch jingling with gold coins.

name: Pile of Gold
description: A generous handful of gold coins from the treasure hoard.

name: Torch
description: A wooden torch wrapped in oil-soaked cloth. Useful for lighting dark places.

name: Old Map
description: A faded map of the Verdantia region showing villages, forests, mountains, and caves. Some locations are marked with warnings.

name: Greater Health Potion
description: A large flask of brilliant red liquid that swirls with golden motes. Restores a large amount of health.

name: Steel Sword
description: A finely crafted steel blade with a leather-wrapped grip. Superior to iron in every way.

name: Chainmail Armor
description: Interlocking steel rings form a protective shirt. Heavy but effective against slashing attacks.

name: Wolf Pelt
description: A thick gray wolf pelt, still warm. Could be sold or perhaps used by a skilled craftsman.

name: Antidote
description: A small vial of green liquid that cures poison and restores a bit of health.

name: Pickaxe
description: A sturdy iron pickaxe, essential for mining ore from rock veins.

name: Copper Ore
description: A chunk of raw copper ore. Can be smelted into a copper bar.

name: Iron Ore
description: A heavy piece of raw iron ore. Can be smelted into an iron bar.

name: Coal
description: A lump of black coal, used as fuel for smelting.

name: Copper Bar
description: A refined bar of copper. Used in basic smithing recipes.

name: Iron Bar
description: A refined bar of iron. Used in advanced smithing recipes.

name: Copper Dagger
description: A simple dagger forged from copper. Light and quick, but not very strong.

name: Iron Dagger
description: A keen iron dagger, balanced for speed. Deals solid damage with quick strikes.

name: Steel Plate
description: Heavy plate armor forged from refined iron. Provides excellent protection.

name: Rusty Sword
description: A pitted, corroded blade scavenged from a fallen skeleton. Better than nothing, barely.

name: Thornwood Staff
description: A gnarled staff carved from living thornwood. Barbs along its length make each strike vicious.

name: Crystal Shard Blade
description: A sword forged around a core of resonating crystal. It hums with energy and strikes with blinding speed.

name: Lich Staff
description: A staff of blackened bone topped with a pulsing gem. Dark whispers echo from within, granting terrible power.

name: Bone Shield
description: A round shield fashioned from interlocking bones. Lighter than it looks, and surprisingly durable.

name: Living Bark Armor
description: Armor grown from enchanted bark that slowly repairs itself. Tough as iron but flexible as leather.

name: Shadow Cloak
description: A cloak woven from the essence of restless spirits. It blurs the wearer's outline, making them harder to hit.

name: Wurm Scale Armor
description: Heavy armor crafted from the interlocking scales of a deep wurm. Nearly impervious to blades.

name: Thorn Barb
description: A wickedly sharp barb pulled from a thorn vine. Could be useful for crafting.

name: Toad Gland
description: A slimy gland extracted from a venomous toad. Alchemists prize its toxic secretions.

name: Spider Fang
description: A hollow fang from a cave spider, still coated in venom residue.

name: Bone Shard
description: A jagged fragment of ancient bone, faintly warm to the touch.

name: Spirit Essence
description: A shimmering vial of captured spectral energy. It glows with a cold, otherworldly light.

name: Crystal Shard
description: A fragment of luminous cave crystal that pulses with faint energy.

name: Heartwood
description: Dense, magically-infused wood from the core of an enchanted tree. Warm and faintly glowing.

name: Ancient Coin
description: A heavy gold coin stamped with the seal of a forgotten kingdom. Collectors would pay handsomely for it.

name: Minor Mana Draught
description: A small flask of shimmering blue liquid that invigorates the body and mends minor wounds.

name: Elixir of Vigor
description: A potent golden elixir that floods the body with restorative energy. Heals significant wounds.
